author: @wkyt
title: FIRST ALERT FORECAST: Sunglasses Needed This Weekend
text:
FIRST ALERT FORECAST: Sunglasses Needed This Weekend
We are giving you the FIRST ALERT to plenty of sunshine this weekend.
We had plenty of sunshine as we rolled throughout your Friday.
Highs were in the 40s, however we had our high around midnight.
Temperatures did hover in the 30s throughout the day.
If you have plans this weekend, it’s not a bad weekend to get out and enjoy it as we’ll see plenty of sunshine with highs in the mid to upper 50s.
Some places near Pikeville as well as Somerset could make it into the low 60s.
Albeit windy, with some places seeing wind gusts as high as 20-30 MPH, I wouldn’t let it ruin your plans.
Then we head into Sunday, where we cool off with highs back into the mid 40s.
As we head into the holiday week, we will see a warming trend continue with shower chances returning.
Monday will be in the upper 40s and low 50s,
We will go into the mid 50s by Tuesday and by Christmas Day, we are looking at highs in the low to mid 60s!
Sorry, Santa! We tried.
Enjoy your morning.
